title: Midnight Rain
description: 1977... In a small town called Midnight, North Carolina, twelve-year-old Kyle Mackey ventures toward a strange new world called manhood... Kyle's older brother Dan is going away to college. The night before Dan's flight leaves for Florida, Kyle visits what he calls his "Secret Place" -- an old shack in the woods bordering Midnight.But Kyle stumbles upon something that proves his favorite spot in the world is neither as private nor as innocent as he once thought...It begins with the naked, battered corpse of a young woman. And, standing over her, a man Kyle knows...
author: James Newman
